name: HEARTWOOD
description:
Heartwood is a short, dreamlike adventure with eerie and beautiful sounds.

Heartwood was inspired by games, dreams, folk tales, theme park rides, horror movies, installation art and forests.

  • "Wonderfully evocative" – Rock Paper Shotgun
  • "Masterful sound design" – PC Gamer
  • "Disturbingly beautiful" - Super Level

CREDITS

Design/Programming: Kerry Turner
Audio: Dan Bibby/Cicada Skins
Additional Graphic Design: Alice Parsons
